unnormalised: Arre, heard Tata Sons got a notice under Section 241 of the Companies Act, 2013 – serious corporate law stuff, bhai! Hope they sort it out soon, before the 31/12 deadline.
normalised: Arre, heard Tata Sons got a notice under Section two hundred and forty one of the Companies Act, two thousand and thirteen – serious corporate law stuff, bhai! Hope they sort it out soon, before the thirty first december deadline.
